verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> Now it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <WH4191> crying שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> when David שָׁ֔ב <WH7725> was returned מֵהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> from the slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> of the Amalekites וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <WH3427> had abode דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> and David בְּצִקְלָ֖ג <WH6860> in Ziklag יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> two

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> It came even to pass on the third וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> that behold a man בָּ֤א <WH935> came מִן־ <WH4480> out הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> out of the camp מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> from Saul וּבְגָדָ֣יו <WH899> with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <WH7167> rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> and earth עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בְּבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> and [so] it was when he came אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> that he fell אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH7812> and did obeisance

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֵ֥י <WH335> where מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he תָּב֑וֹא <WH935> unto him From whence comest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> thou? And he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> from מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> unto him Out of the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נִמְלָֽטְתִּי׃ <WH4422> am I escaped

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> about דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David מֶה־ <WH4100> unto him How הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> things הַגֶּד־ <WH5046> tell נָ֣א <WH4994> I beseech thee לִ֑י וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> me And he answered אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נָ֨ס <WH5127> are fled הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> That the people מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> from the battle וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also הַרְבֵּ֞ה <WH7235> and many נָפַ֤ל <WH5307> also are fallen מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people וַיָּמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> and dead וְגַ֗ם <WH1571> also שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> and Saul וִיהוֹנָתָ֥ן <WH3083> and Jonathan בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> are dead

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> unto the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <WH5046> that told ל֑וֹ אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> him How knowest כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֥ת <WH4191> be dead שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> thou that Saul וִיהֽוֹנָתָ֥ן <WH3083> and Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> him said הַנַּ֣עַר ׀ <WH5288> And the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <WH5046> that told ל֗וֹ נִקְרֹ֤א <WH7122> by chance נִקְרֵ֙יתִי֙ <WH7136> As I happened בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount הַגִּלְבֹּ֔עַ <WH1533> Gilboa וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> behold Saul נִשְׁעָ֣ן <WH8172> leaned עַל־ <WH5921> on חֲנִית֑וֹ <WH2595> upon his spear וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold הָרֶ֛כֶב <WH7393> and lo the chariots וּבַעֲלֵ֥י <WH1167> archer הַפָּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> and the horsemen הִדְבִּקֻֽהוּ׃ <WH1692> followed hard

וַיִּ֥פֶן <WH6437> And when he looked אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> behind וַיִּרְאֵ֑נִי <WH7200> him he saw וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> me and called אֵלָ֔י <WH413> to me וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> unto me And I answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2005> behold

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said לִ֖י מִי־ <WH4310> Who אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> said ק) אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about עֲמָלֵקִ֖י <WH6003> him I [am] an Amalekite אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> he

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> He said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about עֲמָד־ <WH5975> unto me again Stand נָ֤א <WH4994> Please עָלַי֙ <WH5921> beside וּמֹ֣תְתֵ֔נִי <WH4191> I pray thee upon me and slay כִּ֥י <WH3588> because אֲחָזַ֖נִי <WH270> is come הַשָּׁבָ֑ץ <WH7661> me for anguish כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because כָל־ <WH3605> all manner ע֥וֹד <WH5750> still נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> upon me because my life בִּֽי׃

וָאֶעֱמֹ֤ד <WH5975> So I stood עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> beside וַאֲמֹ֣תְתֵ֔הוּ <WH4191> upon him and slew כִּ֣י <WH3588> because יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> him because I was sure כִּ֛י <WH3588> because לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> that he could not live אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after נִפְל֑וֹ <WH5307> that he was fallen וָאֶקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and I took הַנֵּ֣זֶר ׀ <WH5145> the crown אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> beside רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> that [was] upon his head וְאֶצְעָדָה֙ <WH685> and the bracelet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> beside זְרֹע֔וֹ <WH2220> that [was] on his arm וָאֲבִיאֵ֥ם <WH935> and have brought אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> them hither unto my lord הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> here

וַיַּחֲזֵ֥ק <WH2388> took hold דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> Then David [בִּבְגָדֹו כ] (בִּבְגָדָ֖יו <WH899> apparel ק) וַיִּקְרָעֵ֑ם <WH7167> and rent וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> and also כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וַֽיִּסְפְּדוּ֙ <WH5594> And they mourned וַיִּבְכּ֔וּ <WH1058> and wept וַיָּצֻ֖מוּ <WH6684> and fasted עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until even עַל־ <WH5921> for שָׁא֞וּל <WH7586> for Saul וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> and for Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son וְעַל־ <WH5921> and for עַ֤ם <WH5971> and for the people יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> because נָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> because they were fallen בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> by the sword ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> unto the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <WH5046> that told ל֔וֹ אֵ֥י <WH335> Where מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and he וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> him Whence [art] thou? And he answered בֶּן־ <WH1121> I [am] the son אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> of an גֵּ֥ר <WH1616> alien עֲמָלֵקִ֖י <WH6003> an Amalekite אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> then דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> And David אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not יָרֵ֔אתָ <WH3372> unto him How wast thou not afraid לִשְׁלֹ֙חַ֙ <WH7971> to stretch forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand לְשַׁחֵ֖ת <WH7843> to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> מְשִׁ֥יחַ <WH4899> anointed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD'S

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David לְאַחַד֙ <WH259> one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> of the young men וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said גַּ֣שׁ <WH5066> Go near פְּגַע־ <WH6293> [and] fall בּ֑וֹ וַיַּכֵּ֖הוּ <WH5221> upon him And he smote וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> him that he died

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David [דָּמֵיךָ כ] (דָּמְךָ֖ <WH1818> bloodshed ק) עַל־ <WH5921> is on רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7218> [be] upon thy head כִּ֣י <WH3588> for פִ֗יךָ <WH6310> for thy mouth עָנָ֤ה <WH6030> hath testified בְךָ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> against thee saying אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מֹתַ֖תִּי <WH4191> I have slain אֶת־ <WH853> מְשִׁ֥יחַ <WH4899> anointed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD'S ס

וַיְקֹנֵ֣ן <WH6969> lamented דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH854> for הַקִּינָ֖ה <WH7015> with this lamentation הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> over שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> over Saul וְעַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוֹנָתָ֥ן <WH3083> and over Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> (Also he bade לְלַמֵּ֥ד <WH3925> them teach בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> [the use of] the bow הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> behold [it is] written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> in the book הַיָּשָֽׁר׃ <WH3477> of Jashar

הַצְּבִי֙ <WH6643> The beauty יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּמוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1116> upon thy high places חָלָ֑ל <WH2491> is slain אֵ֖יךְ <WH349> How נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> fallen גִבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> how are the mighty

אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> Tell בְגַ֔ת <WH1661> [it] not in Gath אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תְּבַשְּׂר֖וּ <WH1319> publish בְּחוּצֹ֣ת <WH2351> [it] not in the streets אַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <WH831> of Askelon פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or תִּשְׂמַ֙חְנָה֙ <WH8055> rejoice בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> lest the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> Or תַּעֲלֹ֖זְנָה <WH5937> triumph בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> lest the daughters הָעֲרֵלִֽים׃ <WH6189> of the uncircumcised

הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> Ye mountains בַגִּלְבֹּ֗עַ <WH1533> of Gilboa אַל־ <WH408> nor טַ֧ל <WH2919> [let there be] no dew וְאַל־ <WH408> nor מָטָ֛ר <WH4306> neither [let there be] rain עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> and וּשְׂדֵ֣י <WH7704> upon you nor fields תְרוּמֹ֑ת <WH8641> of offerings כִּ֣י <WH3588> For שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there נִגְעַל֙ <WH1602> is vilely cast away מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> for there the shield גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> of the mighty מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> the shield שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul בְּלִ֖י <WH1097> not מָשִׁ֥יחַ <WH4899> [as though he had] not [been] anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> with oil

מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> From the blood חֲלָלִ֗ים <WH2491> of the slain מֵחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> from the fat גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> of the mighty קֶ֚שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> of Jonathan לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נָשׂ֖וֹג <WH7734> turned אָח֑וֹר <WH268> not back וְחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> and the sword שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not תָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> returned רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> not empty

שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul וִיהוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3083> and Jonathan הַנֶּאֱהָבִ֤ים <WH157> [were] lovely וְהַנְּעִימִם֙ <WH5273> and pleasant בְּחַיֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH2416> in their lives וּבְמוֹתָ֖ם <WH4194> and in their death לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not נִפְרָ֑דוּ <WH6504> they were not divided מִנְּשָׁרִ֣ים <WH5404> than eagles קַ֔לּוּ <WH7043> they were swifter מֵאֲרָי֖וֹת <WH738> than lions גָּבֵֽרוּ׃ <WH1396> they were stronger

בְּנוֹת֙ <WH1323> Ye daughters יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> over שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul בְּכֶ֑ינָה <WH1058> weep over הַמַּלְבִּֽשְׁכֶ֤ם <WH3847> who clothed שָׁנִי֙ <WH8144> you in scarlet עִם־ <WH5973> you עֲדָנִ֔ים <WH5730> with [other] delights הַֽמַּעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> who put עֲדִ֣י <WH5716> on ornaments זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold עַ֖ל <WH5921> on לְבוּשְׁכֶֽן׃ <WH3830> upon your apparel

אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How נָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> fallen גִבֹּרִ֔ים <WH1368> How are the mighty בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of the battle יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> O Jonathan עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּמוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1116> in thine high places חָלָֽל׃ <WH2491> [thou wast] slain

צַר־ <WH6887> I am distressed לִ֣י עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> and אָחִי֙ <WH251> for thee my brother יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> Jonathan נָעַ֥מְתָּ <WH5276> pleasant לִּ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> very נִפְלְאַ֤תָה <WH6381> to me was wonderful אַהֲבָֽתְךָ֙ <WH160> hast thou been unto me thy love לִ֔י מֵאַהֲבַ֖ת <WH160> passing the love נָשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> of women
אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How נָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> fallen גִבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> How are the mighty וַיֹּאבְד֖וּ <WH6> perished כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> and the weapons מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war פ
